SELECT * FROM ( SELECT HM.HOSP_CD, HM.HOSP_UUID, RTRIM(HM.HOSP_NM) AS HOSP_NM, HM.HOSP_ADDR, HM.HOSP_EXTRADR, HM.HOSP_CEO, HM.BUSI_NUM , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN (SELECT SUB_CODE_NM FROM TBL_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE_CD = 'CONACT_GB' AND SUB_CODE = HC.CONACT_GB) END , '')) AS NAME1, MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.START_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS START_DT, MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.END_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS END_DT, MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.JOIN_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS JOIN_DT , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.ACCEPT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS ACCEPT_DT , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '1' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.CLOSE_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS CLOSE_DT , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN (SELECT SUB_CODE_NM FROM TBL_CODE_DTL WHERE CODE_CD = 'CONACT_GB' AND SUB_CODE = HC.CONACT_GB) END , '')) AS NAME2, MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.START_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS START_DT2, MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.END_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS END_DT2 , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.JOIN_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS JOIN_DT2 , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.ACCEPT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS ACCEPT_DT2 , MAX(IFNULL(CASE WHEN HC.CONACT_GB = '2' THEN DATE_FORMAT(HC.CLOSE_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') END , '')) AS CLOSE_DT2 , MAX(CASE WHEN HM.HOSP_CD <> '' THEN HM.UPD_DTTM END) AS UPD_DTTM FROM TBL_HOSP_MST HM LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_HOSPCONT_MST HC ON HM.HOSP_CD = HC.HOSP_CD AND HC.CONACT_GB IN ('1', '2') WHERE HM.ACTION_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY HM.HOSP_CD, HM.HOSP_UUID, HM.HOSP_NM, HM.HOSP_ADDR, HM.HOSP_EXTRADR, HM.HOSP_CEO, HM.BUSI_NUM ) A WHERE 1 = 1
